bug.author: wenx123
bug.description: As the title, can not start with win 10 from v1.2.0 to v1.2.2. But Ok with v1.1.0 at the same PC.Do I need any other programs ?

comments.comment: Like this, start and no effect.
The usage is literally described below the command. DreamPower is the CLI, not the UI. If you were expecting a UI, that's DreamTime.
